entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lachute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain this evening then to rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
